name: Holey Hell
description:
try to stay alive as you run and jump
deeper and deeper into the holey hell

inspired by past projects of mine including wibble wobble, breaker, the sun and moon and outline

play on keyboard or gamepad
alt+enter to toggle fullscreen

made by Daniel Linssen (@managore)
for ludum dare 48 ("deeper and deeper")

made with gms 1.4, jfxr and aseprite
colours based on the fleja master palette
